Uses of Class
org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine.AbstractAction

  • Packages that use AbstractAction 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine  

    • Uses of AbstractAction in org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine

      Subclasses of AbstractAction in org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractUpgradeStartAction
      Base class for upgrade related Actions wanting some shared functionality.
      class  DeleteDeleteAction
      StateMachine Action handling delete with a ReleaseService.
      class  InstallInstallAction
      StateMachine Action handling calls to ReleaseService install methods depending if either InstallRequest or InstallProperties exists in a message header.
      class  RollbackStartAction
      StateMachine Action preparing a rollback.
      class  UpgradeCancelAction
      StateMachine Action
      class  UpgradeCheckTargetAppsAction
      StateMachine Action checking upgrade status with an UpgradeStrategy.
      class  UpgradeDeleteSourceAppsAction
      StateMachine Action accepting app with an UpgradeStrategy.
      class  UpgradeDeployTargetAppsAction
      StateMachine Action deploying app with an UpgradeStrategy.
      class  UpgradeDeployTargetAppsFailedAction
      StateMachine Action which simple sends an event to machine to cancel an upgrade.
      class  UpgradeDeployTargetAppsSucceedAction
      StateMachine Action which simple sends an event to machine to accept an upgrade.
      class  UpgradeStartAction
      StateMachine Action preparing upgrage logic and adds ReleaseAnalysisReport and cutoff time to a context.
